additionalProperty.name: Ingredients
additionalProperty.value: COMPONENTS: Approx % by count RT Perennial Ryegrass 58% Annual Ryegrass 32% Couchgrass 6% Red Fescue 4% This blend also contains approximately 20% by weight (bentonite), a granular soil conditioner.
